title: Human Torch Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the August 1940 issue, and was filed in 1968.
Prior to this title, the Human Torch character appeared in Marvel Mystery Comics (from its first issue, also published as Marvel Comics #1).
